examples.example: 每个人都应该意识到健康的重要性，好好爱护自己的身体。

translate.english: Everyone should realize the importance of health and take good care of their own bodies.

examples.example: 良好的沟通在人际关系中是非常重要的。

translate.english: Good communication is very important in interpersonal relationships.

examples.example: 对于学生来说，培养良好的学习习惯是非常重要的。

translate.english: For students, it is very important to cultivate good study habits.
